traits.name: Agility
traits.description: Nimbleness, dexterity, and overall physical coordination of muscles and reflexes.

traits.name: Smarts
traits.description: Raw intellect, perception, and ability to sort and make use of complex information.

traits.name: Spirit
traits.description: Inner strength and willpower.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Raw muscle power.

traits.name: Vigor
traits.description: Endurance, health, and constitution.

traits.name: Academics
traits.description: Knowledge of liberal arts, social sciences, literature, history, etc.

traits.name: Athletics
traits.description: Overall athletic coordination and ability. Climbing, jumping, balancing, wrestling, skiing, swimming, throwing, or catching.

traits.name: Battle
traits.description: Strategy, tactics, and understanding military operations. A key skill in Mass Battles.

traits.name: Boating
traits.description: Ability to sail or pilot a boat, ship, or other watercraft.

traits.name: Common Knowledge
traits.description: General knowledge of a character’s world.

traits.name: Driving
traits.description: The ability to control, steer, and operate ground vehicles.

traits.name: Faith
traits.description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Miracles).

traits.name: Fighting
traits.description: Skill in armed and unarmed combat.

traits.name: Focus
traits.description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Gifted).

traits.name: Gambling
traits.description: Skill and familiarity with games of chance.

traits.name: Healing
traits.description: The ability to treat and heal Wounds and diseases, and decipher forensic evidence.

traits.name: Intimidation
traits.description: A character’s ability to threaten others into doing what she wants.

traits.name: Language
traits.description: Knowledge and fluency in a particular language.

traits.name: Notice
traits.description: General awareness and perception.

traits.name: Occult
traits.description: Knowledge of supernatural events, creatures, history, and ways.

traits.name: Performance
traits.description: Singing, dancing, acting, or other forms of public expression.

traits.name: Persuasion
traits.description: The ability to convince others to do what you want.

traits.name: Piloting
traits.description: Skill with maneuvering vehicles that operate in three dimensions, such as airplanes, helicopters, spaceships, etc.

traits.name: Repair
traits.description: The ability to fix mechanical and electrical gadgets.

traits.name: Research
traits.description: Finding written information from various sources.

traits.name: Riding
traits.description: A character’s skill in mounting, controlling, and riding a tamed beast.

traits.name: Science
traits.description: Knowledge of scientific fields such as biology, chemistry, geology, engineering, etc.

traits.name: Shooting
traits.description: Precision with any type of ranged weapon.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Magic).

traits.name: Stealth
traits.description: The ability to sneak and hide.

traits.name: Survival
traits.description: How to find food, water, or shelter, and tracking.

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: Insulting or belittling another. Almost always done as a Test

traits.name: Thievery
traits.description: Sleight of hand, pickpocketing, lockpicking, and other typically shady feats.

traits.name: Trade
traits.description: Trade (x) is for day-to-day tasks needed to run a business (blacksmith, saloon owner, miner, etc.). Note the specific trade in parentheses. Trade lets an entrepreneur raise funds (as the Performance skill in Savage Worlds) through advertising, money-saving tactics, and buying cheaper goods.

traits.name: Weird Science
traits.description: The arcane skill for Arcane Background (Weird Science).
